name: ClinicApp(Demo)
0:
”Alexa, open my clinic”
”Alexa, start my clinic”
”Alexa, launch my clinic”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my clinic
des:
Our voice app for clinics or hospitals will help doctors provide an additional means for the patients to get information from their clinics. It would help patients book, reschedule or cancel appointments, inquire about the medical test results, ask for medicine availability and many more activities. Since, no human intervention is required from the clinics' end, the answer that the client gets is almost instantaneous, hence resulting in enhanced customer experience.

Launch the skill and simply say "help" to know the available commands. 

This is a demo voice app developed by Digitall DNA. 
For development or integration related queries, please contact us via our website www.thedigitaldna.net
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
